thread.title: Young mum claims womanising Walford hardman Danny Dyer sent her pic of his manhood – and begged her for filthy vids using Cockney rhyming slang weeks before his wedding
thread.title_full: Young mum claims womanising Walford hardman Danny Dyer sent her pic of his manhood – and begged her for filthy vids using Cockney rhyming slang weeks before his wedding

title: Young mum claims womanising Walford hardman Danny Dyer sent her pic of his manhood – and begged her for filthy vids using Cockney rhyming slang weeks before his wedding
text:
‘Drunk’ Danny Dyer appears to be led away by security outside boozy night at the NTAs 
They went on to meet at a number of promotional events where the actor made guest appearances, but did not have a physical sexual relationship. 
A close pal of the woman, who wants to remain anonymous, last night branded Dyer a “cheat” who used his celebrity status to ask for photos. 
Joanne, 40, proposed to 39-year-old Dyer on Valentine’s Day 2015 and they sold the exclusive rights to their big day to glossy magazine Hello! 
But weeks before they wed, he was using his verified Twitter account — with 1.2million followers — to secretly beg the young mum for sex videos. 
Dyer has been exposed as a cheat in the past but was always taken back by Joanne, mum to his three kids. The 'exhausted' star jetted off to South Africa Rex Features The boozed-up star has been told be bosses to sort his life out Jo puts up with years of affairs BY STEPHEN MOYES 
DANNY Dyer’s loyal wife has stood by him despite a string of affairs. Joanne Mas, 40, has been with the actor, 39, since they met as teenagers in 1995. In 2014 she forgave Dyer after he spent the night with a student, aged 21. The brunette took a naked snap of the star on her mobile after they met in a nightclub. The same year Dyer had a threesome with Cara Chamberlain, 29, and her pal in a Blackpool hotel. In 2013 blonde Laura Boyd, 20, told how she had sex with the star four times in one night at a Belfast hotel. She said: “It was the best sex I have ever had.” In 2008 Joanne booted Dyer out after he went on a wild bender with Lily Allen. She also gave him his marching orders in 2001 when he was linked with Billie Piper. Dyer has previously admitted to cheating on Joanne, the mother of his three children, despite describing her as his “f rock”. In 2009 he explained: “I’ve done so many things I’ve regretted. “I’ve royally f up with my missus. I got caught doing something I shouldn’t have. “I hate myself for what I did and for being tempted by forbidden fruit.” Capital Pictures On June 27 Dyer sent the woman the picture of his willy poking from his white and black Calvin Klein boxers 
He vowed he would not stray again, saying in a March 2015 interview after his engagement: “I thought the grass was greener but it was horrible. 
“I don’t want to go there again. 
“I have cheated in the past and I suffered the consequences quite badly. 
“Jo’s always been the girl for me. 
“Those things happened a long time ago and what we’ve got together is much more important than that.” 
Dyer also told Hello! in an interview during his wedding: “I was overwhelmed. 
“Jo looked stunning — and seeing her there with all my be­autiful children I was really moved.” 
Joanne told the mag: “I have dreamed about this day my whole life and I just wanted it to be perfect.” 
The couple’s daughter Dani, 19 was Joanne’s maid-of-honour, while Sunnie, nine was a bridesmaid and son Art, two, stepped in as a page boy. 
Dyer added: “To be standing here with the girl I grew up with — looking so beautiful — is a lovely thing. 
“Jo is my best girl, the love of my life. 
“Without her I would be nothing.” BBC
